mapper.select: SELECT car_num value1,count(*) value2 from (SELECT * from park_info WHERE time_in >= #{0} and time_in <= #{1}) as b GROUP BY value1;
SELECT car_num value1,count(*) value2 from (SELECT * from park_info WHERE time_in >= #{0} and time_in <= #{1}) as b GROUP BY value1 limit 0,20;
SELECT time_in timeIn,time_out timeOut from park_info where car_num=#{0};
